statements: SELECT project_id, project_name, progress_percentage FROM project_reports;
SELECT * FROM project_reports WHERE project_manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_reports WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT project_id, project_manager FROM project_reports WHERE end_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM project_reports ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, progress_percentage FROM project_reports WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY project_name DESC
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_reports WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT project_id, project_manager, performance_metrics FROM project_reports WHERE project_manager LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY project_id ASC
SELECT project_name, progress_percentage, start_date, end_date FROM project_reports WHERE progress_percentage <= 25 ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT project_id, project_name, progress_percentage, performance_metrics FROM project_reports WHERE performance_metrics->>'budget' > '100000' ORDER BY project_id ASC
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, status FROM projects WHERE status='Completed';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM metrics WHERE metric_value > 1000;
SELECT project_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM projects JOIN metrics ON projects.project_id = metrics.project_id;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT project_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM projects p JOIN metrics m ON p.project_id = m.project_id WHERE p.start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, COUNT(metric_id) AS total_metrics FROM projects p LEFT JOIN metrics m ON p.project_id = m.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_metrics > 5;
SELECT project_name, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_metric_value FROM projects p JOIN metrics m ON p.project_id = m.project_id GROUP BY project_name ORDER BY avg_metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_status='In Progress';
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE project_id='3f72c778-4848-4e58-9a64-3295efada4c4';
SELECT project_name, task_name, task_due_date FROM projects JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT task_name, task_status, task_due_date FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE project_id = 'd61e1e81-9f75-4c1d-b82a-4e6788d0d138';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, task_name, task_due_date FROM projects JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, member_name, role FROM projects JOIN team_members ON projects.project_id = team_members.project_id;
SELECT project_name, project_manager FROM Project;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM Task WHERE task_status='In Progress';
SELECT user_id, email FROM User ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT task_description FROM Task WHERE project_id = 'abc-123' AND task_status='Completed';
SELECT * FROM TaskLog WHERE hours_spent > 5 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, project_manager, start_date FROM Project WHERE project_manager = 'John';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM User WHERE role = 'Developer' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_status FROM Task WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01';

SELECT Project.project_name, Task.task_name, TaskLog.hours_spent FROM Project JOIN Task ON Project.project_id = Task.project_id JOIN TaskLog ON Task.task_id = TaskLog.task_id WHERE TaskLog.hours_spent > 5;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_manager FROM projects WHERE project_manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department, employee_name;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_manager FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_status FROM tasks ORDER BY task_status DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees JOIN task_assignments ON employees.employee_id = task_assignments.employee_id WHERE hours_worked > 0;
SELECT project_name, task_name, progress_status FROM projects JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id JOIN task_progress ON tasks.task_id = task_progress.task_id;
